title: Software Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Interactive E-Learning for Conflict Resolution and Diversity Understanding

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social relationship comprehension and digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze conflict cases between individuals from diverse cultural backgrounds and present three or more resolution strategies.
Learners can resolve conflict situations in VR simulations with over 80% accuracy using nonviolent methods.
Through project-based assessment, learners can develop educational content that includes conflict prevention and diversity-respecting measures, incorporating peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
